data.name: Guacamelee! Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Guacamelee Original Soundtrack featuring music by Rom Di Prisco and Peter Chapman. 30 remastered high-resolution tracks, over 1 hour of music (MP3 320kbps) - PLUS 4 bonus remixes not heard in the game. The thumping, colourful soundtrack combines the guitars and trumpets of its Mexican-inspired world with driving electronic beats - the perfect music to suplex skeletons by.

Songs will be placed in your Guacamelee folder in the Steam Directory:
... Steam\SteamApps\common\Guacamelee\Soundtrack


Tracklist

01 Main Menu
02 Pueblucho
03 Pueblucho (World of the Dead)

12 Temple of Rain (World of the Dead)

14 Caverna del Pollo (World of the Dead)

16 Desierto Caliente (World of the Dead)
17 Tule Tree
18 Tule Tree (World of the Dead)
19 Sierra Morena
20 Sierra Morena (World of the Dead)
21 Great Temple
22 Great Temple (World of the Dead)
23 Final Boss
24 Good Ending
25 Bad Ending
26 Credits (Good Ending)
27 Credits (Bad Ending)
28 The Carlos Calaca Story
29 Back Story
30 Leaderboards

31 BONUS TRACK - Boss Theme (Chiptune Mix)
32 BONUS TRACK - Forest Passage (Original Concept)
33 BONUS TRACK - Leaderboards (Extended Mix)
34 BONUS TRACK - Desierto Caliente (Remix)
